terrapeer.net.helpers
Class WellKnownPeerLoader

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.net.helpers.WellKnownPeerLoader
public class WellKnownPeerLoader
extends java.lang.Object

Load the well-known peer information by HTTP Connection.

          Init loader without http-proxy configure.

                          java.net.UnknownHostException
Load list of rendezvous/relay peer. and insert informations into cache memory.

Parameters:

getAllRendezvous

public java.lang.String[] getAllRendezvous()
Gets a array list of rendezvous peer. The entry is String like a "http://166.61.252.10:9700".

getAllRelays

public java.lang.String[] getAllRelays()
Gets a array list of relay peer. The entry is String like a "http://166.61.252.10:9700".

getTCPRendezvous

public java.lang.String[] getTCPRendezvous()
Gets a array list of rendezvous peer that used TCP. The entry is String like a "166.61.252.10:9700".

getHTTPRendezvous

public java.lang.String[] getHTTPRendezvous()
Gets a array list of rendezvous peer that used HTTP. The entry is String like a "166.61.252.10:9700".

getTCPRelays

public java.lang.String[] getTCPRelays()
Gets a array list of relay peer that used TCP. The entry is String like a "166.61.252.10:9700".

getHTTPRelays

public java.lang.String[] getHTTPRelays()
Gets a array list of relay peer that used HTTP. The entry is String like a "166.61.252.10:9700".
